Title: Requires passengers and operators under eighteen years of age to wear protective headgear
Summary: Requires passengers and operators of bicycles, skateboards, in-line skates and scooters under eighteen years of age to wear protective headgear.
LawCode: Amd ยง1238, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to required protective headgear for operators of bicycles, skateboards, in-line skates and scooters under eighteen years of age
